long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Based on the calendar built by Simone Giertz, the Daily Calendar lets you achieve who you want to become.  By defaulting to action, you take the steps required to put your old self behind you. 

There will be ups and downs in life, but as you diligently stick to a simple goal every day, you will find fulfillment in the things you do.  Its ok to miss a day as long as you always come back to accomplish your goals. 

Reach out to me via email at 
ScottLaughlinEngineering@gmail.com

- Updated to manifest version 3.
- fixed some reading errors on the images
